src:
Пожар бушува край Пловдив

02 Nov 2019, 20:28

Пловдивски пожарникари гасят пожар в склад в село Маноле, сигнал за който е получен привечер, съобщиха от пресцентъра на МВР, цитирани от "Фокус". По първоначални данни огънят е възникнал в помещение, в което се съхраняват дървен материал и стърготини. Няма пострадали. Към мястото са насочени 4 екипа пожарникари, няма риск за съседни сгради.
text:
Iwan Bule considers Luis Milla and former South Korean coach for the Indonesian national team
02 Nov 2019, 20:19 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The name of Luis Milla and former South Korean coach, Shin Tae-yong, are candidates for the Indonesian national team architect. As a result, Simon McMenemy's position is increasingly threatened.
After being elected as Chairman of the PSSI (Ketum) for the 2019-2023 period, Mochamad Iriawan immediately maneuvered. The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule will consider these two names to become Indonesian national team coaches.
"We will be analyzing the Indonesian national team coaches for one to two days. Which trainer is roughly the right for the Indonesian national team," said Iwan Bule on the sidelines of the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (2/11/2019).
"There was also someone who said the name of Milla, we will explore it," he added.
Read the next page, Bolaneters.
